abstract: Driven column review of the 2015 BMW 428i Gran Coupe.
lead_paragraph: The 428i Gran Coupe has room and performance enough to make it compelling for the mainstream buyer, if not the hard-core car enthusiast.

headline.main: Video Review: The BMW 428i, a Coupe Not Done by the Numbers
headline.print_headline: A BMW Coupe Not Done by the Numbers

snippet: The 428i Gran Coupe has room and performance enough to make it compelling for the mainstream buyer, if not the hard-core car enthusiast.
